articles.title: OpenAI unveils ChatGPT ‘Pulse’ — Could it help you trade crypto? - Cointelegraph
articles.description: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Pulse, a personal assistant-like feature that crypto users could use to assist them with trading tips.

articles.title: Pixel Buds Pro 2 Get Huge New Update - Droid Life
articles.description: When Google was talking the talk about the Pixel 10 series last month, they also announced a new color of the Pixel Buds Pro 2 as well as a pretty major update that was on the horizon. That update, which brings a handful of big new features, is rolling out st…

articles.title: Xbox Ally Prices Revealed: Handheld Console Will Cost Up to $1,000 - Variety
articles.description: Microsoft has set the prices for its new Xbox Ally handheld gaming consoles, revealing the premium version will run customers nearly $1,000.

articles.title: Nintendo of America boss Doug Bowser is retiring - The Verge
articles.description: Doug Bowser, longtime president of Nintendo of America, will be retiring from the role at the end of the year.

articles.title: Viral call-recording app Neon goes dark after exposing users' phone numbers, call recordings, and transcripts - TechCrunch
articles.description: Call recording app Neon was one of the top-ranked iPhone apps, but was pulled offline after a security bug allowed any logged-in user to access the call recordings and transcripts of any other user.

articles.title: iPhone 17 Pro cameras reviewed by Halide creator Lux - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Lux, creators of pro camera app Halide, have published their review of the iPhone 17 Pro’s cameras. Here are the highlights.
